content: Almost every time I open it it tells me support for this app will end soon, I follow the installation instructions and get the same message every time. It might be that they no longer support Galaxy Note 5 and aren't able to distinguish this in the messages that pop up but it is very annoying. Aside from that, I do love the convenience and prices with Amazon.

I tried the free trial of prime to see if its something Id be interested using again and after a few days of waiting I was told my package was delayed and possibly lost. I was happy with the previous things I had ordered, they turned up on time and the quality of the items were great, but Its a great app and easy to find what im looking for just wish I could get them on time.

This update is noticeably slower than the last iteration. It also just notified me that something off my wishlist was purchased for me. So much for birthday surprises. And, because of very vague descriptions, I couldn't tell which notification to turn off to stop getting more like that, so I had to just kill all notifications. Not a great app.

The app installs itself without my permission. I prefer to use amazon on my chrome browser not the app, and I have continuously tried to modify my settings to only use the browser version. Whenever I check my email and try to track a package or open a link, the app AUTOMATICALLY opens the links despite me having uninstalled it multiple times! It is pissing me off. I'm not sure if Amazon struck a deal with LG or Android giving them control or how the app is run, but i'm over it. Any love I may have had for the app is completely gone. This is ridiculous.

It will load a page flawlessly. 10-15 seconds later, if that, "Opps. Something went wrong. Return to Amazon Home Page." Every. Freaking. Time... This NEVER happened until I was forced into updating my app. Amazon has lost out on nearly $200 from me, since this update (because I can't read item descriptions when I keep getting returned to the homepage), since I found it easier to stop at Walmart on the way home, instead of having to wait an extra day for shipping by waiting to use my computer, later.

This app used to be good (not great), but at some point in the passed few months they did away with the ability to go through the full list of reviewer's photos in a slideshow format. Now you can only see one at a time or find that specific review and view those few photos in a slideshow. Bring the slideshow view back and add swipe navigation. It's 2018 for crying out loud!!

Online shopping with this app gets around 80 percent. I am mostly satisfied with the shopping and services but not always. Why? Stock updates could be a lot better, if Amazon linked it with their third party sellers. For instance, I could wait forever for one item and it would never come back into stock. Why? When I contact the seller directly, they say they no longer sell the product. This makes the Amazon app frustrating to use and unreliable. Will I continue to use it? Yes!

If you are familiar with shopping at Amazon then you pretty much already know how the app works when buying something. However, if you purchased something that Amazon itself will make the delivery (i.e. Prime or expedited 2 or 3 day delivery, or some other situation), this is where the app shines because when the item is "Out for Delivery", you will be presented as map showing the approx. Location of your package and a notation as to how many stops the driver has before your package and I'll be delivered. The "current location" of the driver is approximate (for their safety" but it's accurate enough so you can plan and 100% accurate when it's delivered. And when it's delivered you will see a photo showing exactly where it is. Those two things are an indicator to me that they have us, the consumer, in mind because it is us (for the most part) who really benefits.

Horrible experience with Amazon and their third-party vendors. Multiple packages either never arrived or arrived with missing or damaged pieces. Customer service was slow and the app made it nearly impossible to communicate and resolve the issue. Won't be using this app, Amazon Prime or Amazon again. To make matter worse, they have blocked any attempts at me posting a review on their site. For faulty products that had only 5 star reviews. Buyer beware.

I was forced to update to this newer Amazon shopping app after getting a message on the old one saying it would no longer be supported or updated. This new one is terribly slow and glitches alot. The images on it for the products are blurry, like they were taken by a flip phone or a very bad photographer, which makes no sense because when I look at the same images in the old app they are crystal clear and perfect. Something is seriously wrong with this app, instead of an upgrade it feels like a down grade. I really hate it. Someone should fix it because it deters me from shopping. I keep going back to the old app to look up things, its sooo frustrating!

this app is not the worse it could be, but it isn't the best. In the past, I could record reviews of products on my phone and upload, from my phone, my video review. With each update of this app, this became more of a challenge, but I managed work arounds (that I should have never had to do to begin with). With this latest app, it refuses to upload videos from my phone, though the option to upload a video via the app is "available". A rep responded to my email inquiry about this and said videos must be uploaded from a computer and be in specific formats, which did not include .mp4 (the standard format for smartphone videos). I'm close to giving this app one star, but it manages to barely still get the job done (i.e.: browsing and ordering).

Avoid at all costs if you're in a non-English country. First time I tried to buy something, I opted to start a prime trial and they immediately locked my account. When I sent them a statement as verification, they couldn't verify because it wasn't in English. Yesterday, they charged the same credit card that they wouldn't verify with a prime subscription which I can neither use nor disable.

Have been a loyal Amazon Prime member and frequent shopper for years. The service isn't at all what it used to be though. What happened to free 2 day shipping for Prime members? Now orders are being split up into individual items, each with their own shipping speed, and something that used to get here in 2 days without issue will now take a week. It's madness. It seems they want you to pay more more more and give you less less less. Honestly, at this point I am mostly using Walmart for everything I used to get through Amazon. Their prices and shipping are both consistent. Amazon can not beat out the competition anymore. Seems like they stopped caring about quality customer service over this past year. Not sure I will continue with Prime when it comes time to renew. Shopping Amazon isn't as fun and rewarding an experience as it used to be.

The app is good and all, but I have to delete it just to log out. Everywhere I look says to go to menu>your acoount>log out but the option does not even exist. I've searched the entirety of the settings about 3 times and came up with nothing. Other people who experienced the same problem, and posted on answer forums not related to amazon, were also told to go to the account menu (as if we didn't already check there first). I would just really appreciate the ability to log out without going the through the hassle of reinstalling.

This is a great app except for one thing... There needs to be more options for notifications. Currently it sends notifications when an item ships, tells me when it will arrive the next day, and let's me know that it's been delivered. I order quite a few items, and they are mostly prime so I know when to expect them. I live on property and packages are left in a box outside the gate, so I like getting the notifications that something has been delivered so I know to go get it. But I'm mostly annoyed by the other notifications. I don't care that it's been shipped and I already know it will be here tomorrow. Unfortunately there is currently no way that I can find to separate out just the notifications I want. It's all three or not at all. I would give the app 5 stars if it had that option.

I bought an exclusive item in a pre-sale, and not only did Amazon lose my item they took no responsibility for it and didn't even notify me about it. Thank God I thought to check. What am I paying that prime membership fee for? They should definitely have something in place to cover their own incompetence. The LAST thing I'm ordering from this app. Terrible!

Majority of users have subscribed to prime services, which guarantees two day shipping. Initially, this was great and items were received well within the promised time frames. However, lately it's more like a 4 or 5 day turnaround. When I speak to customer service, they blame it on logistics. I understand situations come up with shippers, that you have no control over. However, there is no communication with the purchaser about their items being delayed. I've had 3 separate orders in the last month, that have not been delivered within the 2 day window. Quite simply put, if you cant back up the guarantees you offer, then you shouldnt advertise them.

With the latest update the app signs me up for Amazon Prime automatically every time I open the app..regardless of which account is logged in. Also I recieve on average over 10 sales notifications a day. When I block app notifications they get turned back on with each update. It has become Nagware. Uninstall/reinstall doesnt fix the problem. Amazon Customer Service is unable/unwilling to help. Had to uninstall and shop via browser.

Really disillusioned with Amazon. No more next day free shipping but yet Prime has gone from $99 to $139 per year. I think there is a problem here.....paying more & getting much less in return. A lot of the products are actually more expensive thru Amazon as well. Quite a bummer.....probably not renewing since the free next day/2 day shipping was the premise behind paying for Amazon. Another corporation that is out to stick it to the customer.

I love Amazon Prime!! We've saved hundreds on cable by watching free movies & shows w Prime instead. I've gotten a lot of great deals thru out the year, especially on gift items. I love that most items can be at your front door in 3 days or less, free w Prime as well, lol. I just really enjoy not having to leave the house to shop & not having to worry about s&h on my purchases either. :)

Half the items that I try to view only display blacked out pictures. App is not properly integrated with Amazon's source data. Since it actually does work about half the time I rated 2 stars instead of 1 but this is really junk quality. Someone needs dragging over hot coals for such poor QA releasing an Amazon Shopping app that is this bad.

AAA amazing!!! I am so techno sceptical when it comes to online shopping. There's ALWAYS hidden fees and surcharges. So many things advertised as Canadian that end up being USD( I hate that term) but Amazon has converted me. I ordered bike lights yesterday and they were delivered less than 24 hrs later for the $7.46 advertised!!! They work and I was shocked they showed up before dinner on Thanksgiving Sunday!! I'm a born again Amazonian

I uninstalled this app and was just using the old Amazon app. Had a pop up saying "Amazon app will be unsupported soon please install Amazon Shopping". It is horrible. Very sluggish to respond to me choosing items or opening photos of items. It crashes or freezes. I installed this a week ago, and am finding myself feeling very impatient. There was a reason I uninstalled this app originally. Please fix! Or keep supporting the old app.

No doubt, I love shopping with Amazon. Great products, some at ridiculously low prices, jewelry is a great example. Refunds are super easy, but usually refunds were something I failed to get right, clothes size.for example. My experience with delivery has always been that the packages arrived earlier than expected.

This app represents everything that is wrong in big business and advertising now. This app overheard me talking about a very specific product. I never once looked up this product on my phone or on amazon. Right after our conversation I immediately start seeing ads for the product. This is unacceptable. App uninstalled. Never again. Do not wiretap me.

I use Amazon for pretty much everything, which means I am on this app a lot. It was great until a few months ago when it started acting up. Now every time I am using it, it kicks me out of what I'm looking at saying "oops something went wrong." This would be understandable occasionally but it is constant. Unfortunately I don't use the app as much or shop on Amazon as much because it's much more time consuming and a hassle now.

I ordered 4 items , one was added at the wrong color. Did chat with 3 different people not in this country to cancel. Then they said to reorder it. But that turned out wrong also. They said they cannot cancel eventhough I just ordered. So I will have to sent it back. Hassle on the phone for an hour, now more hassle going out to send back.

I travel in an RV full time. I'm able to get needed supplies as well as toys, electronics etc. Delivered to wherever i am! This is a fantastic way to get what i need and want when i need it.. amazon prime makes shipping easy and predictable even when my schedule is a little erratic... well done!!!

Been a member since 2014. Shipping was really fast. As of 2018 the shipping is much slower. I mostly order from Amazon fulfilled and my orders would ship the next day. Now as of 2018 my orders don't ship for days, it just says we are preparing your order. My wife is using Amazon Prim and the last two orders did not come in 2 days. For one of my orders the delivery was time sensitive so I paid extra for two day shipping and it came 4 days later. I am not enjoying or shoppin as much on Amazon as I did the first 3 years.

I'm unable to download an invoice file (which I need badly) for the order that I made through the app (no Invoice button/link available). Customer Service doesn't help. It turns out that my orders made through the app are not registered on Amazon web site, that is, I have only a limited 'local' app account database. Using the app rather than the web site, was a mistake.

I'm the kind of person that had been through a lot of bad choices in ordering, mostly when I had to return items that didn't fix. Do stopped for a long time until I order from Amazon and Boy!  I was and so impress on how easy it is to order and yes return. I will not order from No one other than Amazon.  Sincerely Tina Puga

The app is great....when it works. It force crashes daily or any time I try to view enlarged images of an item. Been doing it for almost a year not with no resolution. Always tells me to update my app before I use it. Still crashes. I'm sick of it.

Samsung Galaxy Note 9; S7 plus; S8 plus; Galaxy Tab A 10.5 inch 2018); LG G3; LG G6. It crashes. Every single time. I cleared the cache, I cleared the storage, I pre-installed the app. I am not resetting the phone and deleting my account for 1 APP. How hard is it to make it not crash, especially on a top of the line phone?

UH-OH something went wrong on our end. Had this for months everytime I click on a listing. The other parts of the app work fine but if I can't look at a listing then the app is useless...terrible app experience and wouldn't reccomend to anyone until they fix the issue.

Shopping online with Amazon have certainly changed how we do things and saved us a ton of time. We highly recommend this app for specialty shopping are those hard to find items you never have to go to the store and find that they are out of something after you've made a trip. I have to admit that I sometimes feel a little addicted to shopping on Amazon

Life long Amazon Customer and user of their Prime Membership because shipping to Hawaii can be so much more costly than the low price they charge annually since everything is flown via Air Mail (charged by weight) unlike the Continental US where it is all driven by large transportation trucks. I've been buying from Amazon since its online inception and my experience w/ this app is my life line to the very best products, information of products and allows an easy comparison of said products for the lowest possible costs. I would recommend this app as it is exactly the same as their website yet so much simpler to use!

In the past, I would have given the app a higher rating. It is easier to refine searches and find what you want on the PC But, this is convenient. The new problem is that since the last update I am unable to close the app without restarting my phone. That is crazy.

I love Prime & I've been a member for a long time now. It's addicting because you can find almost anything you could ever need and most of it comes with free shipping within a day or 2 (or 2 hours with Prime Now). My only gripes are how they've been cutting back Same Day or 1 Day shipping on weekends, and how their customer service chat isn't very helpful till you go up a few levels, but that's not the apps fault

A perfect app to complete all chores without going and visiting places. One stop and all the things are available. A small request though, it would have been better if we could have online assistance (chat service) to check on our orders.
Everytime I try to check out the screen goes blank and it freezes. So far I have been able to use the old app to make purchases, but this is concerns since the old app is going away.

I'll give it five stars when it's easier to switch between accounts. I use Amazon for two businesses and personal and currently have to sign out completely and log back in every time I need to check or buy from one of the other accounts.

When there's an update available and it's inconvenient for me to update the app, the app offers the "remind me later" option, so I proceed to shop, only to have the app stop functioning, and then force me to upgrade immediately. If you're going force the upgrade immediately, why not just force me to do so right off the bat, instead of leading me to believe I can do it some other time?

Just an idea: Dear Amazon, I thank you for your great shopping service. I just have one suggestion. Please leave an option for looking only at, say, one star reviews for products. Generally speaking negative reviews usually offer some insight for what may be a problem with a product and I find them to be very useful for determining if it is right for me. I would appreciate it if you would add a filter to only show these reviews when I want to, as it will help me better determine if a product is a good fit. Thanks for your time. If this already exists in the app, please tell me via a comment reply. Thank you
The app is so slow on my s5. It takes ages for me to be able to scroll through pictures or add things to my wishlist. Buying is fast, but sometimes I don't want to buy, just add to a list.

I order from Amazon almost weekly and I have rarely been disappointed. The prices are usually great, the shipping is always fast with Prime, and they run great deals frequently. And I love using their products such as the Fire Stick and Echo Dot!

New Galaxy 9 plus, none of the Amazon apps work and apparently Amazon doesn't care enough to fix the problem. Too bad the Amazon branded phones failed, maybe if we bought a phone from them they would be bothered to have their apps work in Android.

There's now some items that you can't buy unless you spend $25.... Might be one of the worst ideas ever from a consumer point of view. The reason I buy things on Amazon is because I can spend $8 on something and have it in 2 days. So now I can't buy a case of gum unless I buy something else worth $15. C'mon Amazon I thought you were better.

Apps great but to sign into a new device like idk a phone is a big pain. Asking for you to type password multiple times and asking for the expiration of old debit card (even tried to remove the debit card from amazon account but keeps asking for expiration date. As one of the fastest growing companies it actually is a huge disappointment. Buy stuff through walmart more better and no pain or dumb questions to sign in.

Love Amazon and the app but it keeps messing up. I will try to open it and it will start to open and close right back up. The only way for me to fix it is by uninstalling and reinstalling it, I've had to do it a couple times now.

Last update completely broke the app. Buttons don't work and I can't order anything because the add to cart button is unresponsive. Update: It mysteriously started working again so all is good. Tech support got back to me and said that it needed to be reinstalled but it didn't.

Never had trouble navigating it. Searching, comparing, saving, paying for items & tracking shipments are all easy. Also entertaining if you're bored: go to "interesting finds " & then to "OMG" . Always good for a laugh!

This app sucks. Every time i install it it's somebody else's profile comes up. When I try to reset it on my name it says someone else already associated with this account. Too many distracting adds. Use to be good. I think get greedy too much turns them sloppy.

Great app! Easy to find what your looking for with pricing, vendor, and logical additional recommendations. It offers Order history, Informative customer reviews, and is easy to use. Beats running around or having to look at multiple sites. Delivery and rare returns are a breeze.

Installed today and got rid of prior version. Wrong move. This version does not show the other colors / options etc when a products shows available. Opens the window to a blank white window with Done in top right corner. Very frustrating.

Customer for years. Been happy although this year it seems that the app crashed many times (note 8) that i needed to use another device just to be able to use it. It is a pain on having to turn off the phone or install re install the app. Hope itd be better

Some of the products are a bait and switch. App includes look-alike products among your search criteria. The unwary can order an inferior product. First price viewed is often bumped up when you click on the item.

Lately things are costing more and not arriving on time or if they do arrive on time there are items missing or things are not what one assumed it was to be. More and more I see a lot of misrepresentation on items. I wish Amazon could control that better

beware! i returned 2 packs of bulbs to get refund but they told me that i only returned 1 bulb so they won't give me my money back. they make me a liar! and don't sign up for the prime membership. they will delay your packages so many times and then if it get way to long to delivered they just cancel your order without any notice. they dont even tell you a reason for cancel.

When I see items advertised on Facebook that I might like to buy I am redirected to the Google store to install the Amazon app. My phone is short on space and I don't want to install the app. The current system is trying to force me to install it. The same bullying is why I no longer order from Wish.

No way to use the app with amazon smile and no way to print. So if you want to print a return label, or if you would like amazon to make a donation to charity every time buy at no cost to you, then you are out of luck. You would think they would give their app all the same features as the mobile site.
I used to love this app, but since a recent update, my favorite feature (the barcode scanning) has become almost useless. Never scans the barcodes. Very frustrating.

Why does this app require so much info from your device. On download it wants access to your entire phone from contacts to media. WHY would an app like this need such privacy. Ebay doesn't ask for it so this one shouldn't either. Deleting. Rather go to an actual shop. Less chance of being ripped off by sellers.

How do you not deliver as promised? Had two separate orders that never got delivered. One order was supposed to be next day and almost a week later, nothing. Amazon is really starting to suck. Renewing prime for that extra $20 bucks is looking like a no goðŸ˜¡

The Amazon website pretty much has everything you may or may not need including some things you would have never thought they had for example I found a 5 gallon bucket of paint for a little bit cheaper than you wouldn't have Home Depot in the color that I wanted all my God OMG so have fun and you might have an addiction like me cuz Amazon is very addictive they have everything I need and want and more and sometimes for better prices and you get better deals when you spend $25 or more you get free shipping have fun. Oh one more thing if you sign up for Amazon Prime you get about a two day shipping and pretty much all your shipping is free probably cuz they charge you monthly for you but you can get it for 8.99 a month they have different plans and the whole family will love Amazon you can make everyone happy hopefully. LOL. Have fun with Amazon I do every single time I shop heck yeah.

It's easier and more user friendly to use the mobile website. The app doesn't let me select items that ship with Amazon Prime. I feel like this app is catered to people living in the US and doesn't really support Canadians.

I was forced to download this app because of no support for the Amazon app already on my ZTE Maxx. All it does is crash and lock up. It does not work. If this isn't fixed I will cancel my prime membership and do my shopping elsewhere.

It's a great idea,especially when it comes to fabrics, or arts and crafts, not to mention books or CDs. I like being able to get what I want or need for a project+rather than having to put up with a sparse selection.

Amazon is great in the US and Europe. But they have given up on customers located in Australia. Only very limited choice of goods now offered via their local webpage. Not worth to bother anymore. Sad, it was a company delivering great customer service.
Easy to use app. Always end up buying more than what I intended to but that's alright. Large selection of many items. I have never received damaged products and have been delivered as scheduled.
Sorting and finding what you need seems to take forever especially when you do it on your phone vs doing it on a laptop but even on the laptop it still takes too long to find items.

I really wish they wouldn't charge so much for shipping all the time, so what if i dont break the bank all the time, give the little guys a break. Great app other than that. Oh and can the free subscription to prime be like twice a year plz?!

This app is way to glitchy. It freezes, has problems showing photos and item imformation. I had it this app before and deleted it to use the original Amazon app. But now that one no longer exists I'm forced back to this annoying app.
Whenever I tap to select any options (add to cart, buy now, etc.) it doesn't do anything. I've had to pass up many products because I simply could not add them to my cart.

It's convenient. However, in "Today's Deals", there is a tab for "Mobile Only" and there is NEVER anything listed under that tab. It would be nice to have some mobile deals there, but otherwise please get rid of the tab if it's going to just be empty.

3 stars because I love amazon. As for this app? It was great. Now, anytime I open the app, it demands to be updated. I try to follow the process, then it says "you'll be updated soon"..Then why bother me? The app work fine. Still doing it.
Amazon prime is my go to!! Reorder is simple, searching and finding what you are looking for is a breeze. Always a great price and the timeliness and convenience is unmatched!!

After this recent update things went south. The app won't even allow me to sign in because it keeps saying to check my internet connection even though it is good. It's quite frustrating really. Please fix this issue amazon.

Absolutely horrid!! As I've watched Amazon customer service dwindle to chat with those who can't understand written word I didn't think it could get worse. Wrong......now they just wiped out the app that at least did somethin. Now this rediculous "Prime" app? I've never felt less prime to ANY company.

I pay amazon about $30/mounth for prime and audable. I get monthly mail telling me i have prime video and i should use it. Every movie i want to see they ask for $9.99 or more. I understand you are bussiness but dude you are the richest man in the USA. Let me watch a movie i want to watch every once and a while.

The app is buggy since the last update. Not to mention, what gets my goat the most is that they are incapable or worse unwilling to make it work with VPN service. Nowadays that criminal get more sophisticated by the day and amazon's standpoint is to reduce the individuals security measures. What brillant move... And the best irony ever, they offer their own payment system, but can't even get regular payment from owns bank account right =_=

This amazon is a big scam. I loaded gift cards purchased with cash. But my amazon account was locked for no reason, I provided them with the gift cards receipt times without number but they didn't unlock my account. They are scam
One of my all-time favorite websites. Been a prime member for several years. But the app for Android is not all that great. I was forced to download this from the old app. And now it constantly lags.
I got multiple trial on the verification code which is totally not a good start for me. This is the only shopping app i had a problem with creating an account.
Amazon did not accept my credit or debit card even after I made sure again and again that my payment details were correct. It sucks. I'll only use Aliexpress from now on.
I totally luv, luv Amazon. I can always find what I'm looking for and more. Great prices, super prices. It's the whole package and a bag of chips!!!!!

Wow, surprised! Amazon, why would you make it so hard to login? You send me a verification code and as soon as I leave Amazon app to check this code in my gmail, Amazon resets back to 1st login page where I need to start over again...
The app refuses to let me paste my password. I use a password manager, so my password is too long and complex to type out on my phone. As a result, I will no longer use Amazon until they fix this.

Used to be good. Until they started using their own shipping that I have had to call and complain about them leaving them on the side of the road. On top of our vehicles and now ringing the doorbell when there is a sign on the door saying not to because of a night shift worker sleeping. I'm done with Amazon.

I would give it 5 Stars undoubtably if they actually told the truth on the shipping speed if it just happened once or twice maybe a fluke but literally literally literally and that wasn't a typo I said it three damn times every goddamn time I pay for same day one day shipping when it says it's available that's how me what the pay for it not only it never happens it gets delayed minimum of three extra days
I absolutely love Amazon shopping. Great format, and easy to use. Amazon prime is what everyone should use. So much entertainment and free shipping, we use it everyday.

So, you guys paid lg to install amazon on my phone and make it so I cant even delete it making it bloatware, then turn around and make the app useless by making this app take its place but still not allowing me to delete the other app. Im not giving you permissions to my entire phone. Screw you.

I love Amazon but it keeps telling me that I have to update the app and I literally just recently got the new app. It doesn't make any sense to me . But over all Amazon is amazing and very useful ðŸ’–

Your app ordered stuff off my card without me proceeding to check out, and the reason for it being in the cart it needs to automatically proceed to check out is a lie. Because ive left stuff in the dam cart before and its never proceeded to check out. This app stole my money and i am pissed off
Amazon service is the most incompetent garbage I've ever dealt with. Claims items are in stock then lists delivery dates of months later. Thanks Prime, glad I paid for you.
I love Amazon. And before this last update I loved the app! Now every few minutes I get a nag box popping up telling me Amazon has stopped working. Please please please fix this!

Ordered a pair of speakers. They only sent one speaker. Then they took forever to acknowledge there error. Refuse to give my money back or replace the missing speaker within a timely fashion. Customer service is very poor.
Great app normally, however each time I try to upgrade I'm still in the old version. The app doesn't upgrade. Have gone through the upgrade process three times.
App was fine till recent update after which it is now extremely slow both to open and navigate. Reverting to desktop site.

They pressure you repeatedly to install the amazon shopping app and even go as far as to offer me 5 dollars to do so, and then i forget my policy of not installing shopping apps all over my phone and oblidge the offer. They don't give me the 5 and argue with me when i contact support. Uninstalled.

Yes Amazon has great prices, but be careful because if something goes wrong with your order it is a problem to try get your refund out of them and there customer service doesn't offer any real solutions for apparently such a big organisation.
The updates on delivery status are appalling! In one view it says it's on track, then if you click on the order it says it's delayed, or the other way arround!!!
Every time I open it, I get an error message that says "Oops! Something went wrong. I had a great Amazon app and password since 2002, but they "required" me to update it, F'd me in the A!
I think the app is amazing. A little dissapointed in the fact that i cannot add all my items to my cart and items are being removed and saved for later
Been using for the last what ever years but jew options for the gift card balance is just amazing. So you can top up your Amazon account with different cards. Loving it

I did NOT sign up for prime but they did it automatically and took my money. Ending only offers me a 50% refund and that's not okay. I can't afford this and o DONT regularly shop online so it's useless
The search algorithm gives poor selections. It takes forever to find something even with filters.
Love having this app on my phone! Shop, share, wishlist, buy, save for later! Easy to navigate applications and search option is a lifesaver!
Stuff is not delivered at the guaranteed date, despite being prime. Not notifies you if any problem has occured with your order, only notifies you about offers. Bad product filters.
Amazon app is great , what Amazon provides though can suck big time though , for countries on the company's catalogue maybe top notch , for the rest with international dispatches is a nightmare.
Since the update earlier this month this app has been very slow and sometimes doesn't load at all. It used to work very well.
Worst search ever. Very difficult to narrow down the results. Waste lots of time trying to find a basic thing.
